body_html: It is a known issue that tf.gradients() can't be called inside map_fn, due to some tricky problems with TensorArray. However you can call tf.gradients() inside tf.while_loop so try to use tf.while_loop directly.
body_text: It is a known issue that tf.gradients() can't be called inside map_fn, due to some tricky problems with TensorArray.  However you can call tf.gradients() inside tf.while_loop so try to use tf.while_loop directly.
body: It is a known issue that tf.gradients() can't be called inside map_fn, due to some tricky problems with TensorArray.  However you can call tf.gradients() inside tf.while_loop so try to use tf.while_loop directly.
